price: "Yã abõkaina biyu na kurkuku! Shin iyãyen giji dabam-dabam ne mafiya alhẽri kõ kuwa Allah Makaɗaici Mai tanƙwasãwa?"
arabic: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ ءَأَرۡبَابٞ مُّتَفَرِّقُونَ خَيۡرٌ أَمِ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: yāṣāḥibayi al-sij'ni a-arbābun mutafarriqūna khayrun ami al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
